SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.server

Class GameListenersServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.server.GameListenersServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListenerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class GameListenersServer extends Object implements GameListenerInterface, Serializable
Class used to pass the GameListener to the client via socket It has a private ObjectOutputStream where it writes the data
See Also:
